gobblin.writer

Class FineGrainedWatermarkTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.FineGrainedWatermarkTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentable, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @NotThreadSafe
public class FineGrainedWatermarkTracker
extends Object
implements Instrumentable, Closeable
    A class to handle fine-grain watermarks. Thread-safe only if you know what you are doing :)

      • switchMetricContext

        public void switchMetricContext(List<Tag<?>> tags)
        Description copied from interface: Instrumentable
        Generate a new MetricContext replacing old Tag with input Tag (only tags with the same keys will be replaced), and recreate all metrics in this new context.

        This method is useful when the state of the Instrumentable changes and the user wants that state change to be reflected in the tags of the instrumentation.

        Notice that this method creates a brand new MetricContext and Metric every time it is called, with the associated processing and memory overhead. Use sparingly only for state changes that must be visible in emitted metrics.

        Specified by:
        switchMetricContext in interface Instrumentable
        Parameters:
        tags - additional Tag.

      • switchMetricContext

        public void switchMetricContext(MetricContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Instrumentable
        Switches the existing MetricContext with the supplied metric context and regenerates Metric.

        This method is useful when the state of the Instrumentable changes and the user wants that state change to be reflected in the set of Tag of the instrumentation.

        This method is an alternative to Instrumentable.switchMetricContext(List) when metric context switching is done often between a small set of contexts. The subclass should keep a list of previously generated contexts as a cache, and call this method to simply switch between the different contexts, avoiding the overhead of generating a brand new context every time a metric context switch is required.

        Specified by:
        switchMetricContext in interface Instrumentable
        Parameters:
        context - new MetricContext.
